properties.title: 72 Park
properties.content:
At 72 Park, luxury living meets the vibrant energy of Miami Beach. Located in the desirable North Beach neighborhood, this stunning development offers residents the best of both worlds - a peaceful and exclusive community with easy access to the excitement of the city.

Each unit at 72 Park has been carefully designed to provide maximum comfort and style. Inside, the units are spacious and bright, with open floor plans and high ceilings. Residences combine luxury and style with condo-grade interior finishes. With the use of top of the line Italian cabinetry and energy efficient appliances, a modern and sustainable unit is created. Outdoor amenity space exceeds 30,000 square feet with a viewing deck, outdoor garden and lap pool.

In addition to its luxurious features, 72 Park is also located in a convenient and vibrant neighborhood. Many popular shops, restaurants, and entertainment venues are within walking distance, providing residents with endless opportunities for exploration and enjoyment.
properties.seoDescription: Discover 72 Park: Featuring 22 Stories, designed by Urban Robot. Explore this luxurious Lefferts development in Miami Beach, FL.

properties.title: Palma Miami Beach
properties.content:
Perfectly located in North Beach near the North Shore Park, PALMA Miami Beach features residential and amenity space design that elevate the experience of living in this remarkable community.

Exclusive amenities include a spectacular third-floor lounge and an open pool area overlooking Indian Creek and Allison Island. Inside, a social lounge is appointed with a large TV that is ideal for a relaxed movie night or exciting sporting events. Residents can pursue health and wellness goals in a state-of-the-art fitness center.

Residences designed with premium finishes feature floor-to-ceiling windows that fill the interiors with natural light and showcase stunning views of the eastern shores of Miami Beach. Residents can enjoy the beautiful views from their private balconies or take a dip in the outdoor pool to cool off on hot days.

PALMA Miami Beach is conveniently located near a range of shops, restaurants, and other amenities. It is just a short walk from the North Shore Park, where residents can enjoy a range of outdoor activities such as swimming, picnicking, and biking.
properties.seoDescription: Discover Palma: Featuring 14 Stories and 126 Condominium Residences, designed by Built Form Architecture. Explore this luxurious Lefferts development in Miami Beach, FL.

properties.title: 72 Carlyle
properties.salesGalleryAddress: 580 72nd Street, Retail B.1 Miami Beach FL 33141
properties.content:
72 Carlyle embodies the essence of Miami Beach—where natural beauty meets a sophisticated coastal lifestyle. Designed by Italian master Piero Lissoni, the waterfront residences sit just moments from the ocean and Intracoastal, with easy access to Bal Harbour, Surfside, and the Faena District.

Framing extraordinary views and paired with curated indoor and outdoor amenities, 72 Carlyle brings la dolce vita to Miami Beach.
properties.seoDescription: Discover 72 Carlyle: Featuring 126 Condominium Units, designed by Built Form Architecture. Explore this luxurious Lefferts development in Miami Beach, FL.

properties.title: 880 71st Street
properties.type: 20-story multifamily rental tower with ground-floor retail
properties.content:
The property is situated along the tranquil waters of Indian Creek and Biscayne Bay, offering a new benchmark for rental living in the heart of Normandy Isle. Rising 20 stories, the tower will deliver 120 multifamily units, including 48 workforce residences, complemented by ground-floor retail and an elevated amenity space with panoramic views. Residents will enjoy a mix of spacious studios to two-bedroom layouts, ranging from 520 to over 1,300 square feet, many featuring private balconies with stunning vistas across the Bay.

By leveraging the Florida Live Local Act, this project brings meaningful workforce housing to a high-opportunity neighborhood, delivering affordability without compromise on quality, views, or location.
highlights: Prime location along Indian Creek and Biscayne Bay in Normandy Isle
Elevated amenity space with panoramic views
Mix of spacious studios to two-bedroom layouts
Unit sizes range from 520 to over 1,300 sq ft
properties.seoDescription: Discover 880 71st Street: Featuring 20 Stories and 120 Residences, this waterfront development offers elevated amenities and retail space in Miami Beach, FL. Explore this thoughtfully designed Lefferts project bringing workforce housing to Normandy Isle.

properties.title: 1826 Collins
properties.content: The development is designed to meet Live Local Act workforce housing incentives and provide new housing opportunities within the Lincoln Road and the Art Deco District neighborhood. The 15-story mixed-use tower includes 29 residential units, one floor of office space, and a rooftop amenity area. Residential units range from spacious three-bedroom residences of 3,600 square feet to efficient 500-square-foot studios. Upper-level units and the rooftop offer sweeping views of the ocean and Miami Beach skyline.
highlights: Elevated amenity space with panoramic views
Mix of spacious studios to two-bedroom layouts
Residence sizes range from 520 to over 1,300 sq ft
properties.seoDescription: Discover 1826 Collins: Featuring 15 Stories and 29 Residences, this mixed-use tower includes office space and rooftop amenities. Explore this Lefferts development in Miami Beach, FL, designed to meet Live Local Act workforce housing goals.

properties.title: 800 Collins
properties.content:
800 Collins is a flagship retail space located in the heart of the dynamic Collins Avenue Fashion District. This state-of-the-art commercial space is designed to be a destination for shoppers and businesses alike.

Set on a prime corner, 800 Collins boasts 10,000 square feet of retail space spread over two floors. High-end finishes and modern amenities make it an ideal environment for luxury retailers and upscale restaurants to attract discerning shoppers and diners.
properties.seoDescription: Discover 800 Collins: Featuring 2 Stories and 10,000 Square Feet of flagship retail space. Explore this premier Lefferts commercial development in the heart of Miami Beach’s Collins Avenue Fashion District.

properties.title: 11th Street
properties.content:
A high-rise mixed-use development opportunity in Miami’s urban core offering up to 1,075 buildable units with direct water and city views and unobstructed views of the Signature Bridge.

Property is located steps to the Kaseya Center, home of the Miami Heat, Museum Park, and a plethora of iconic cultural institutions.

Metromover and connection to Brightline make this a highly transit-oriented location, and proximity to Downtown allows for immediate access to Miami’s main business hub.
properties.seoDescription: Discover 11th Street: Featuring up to 1,075 buildable units with direct water and city views, designed by RSP Arch. Explore this high-rise Lefferts development opportunity in the heart of Downtown Miami, steps from Kaseya Center and major transit connections.

properties.title: 54 Flagler
properties.seoDescription: Discover 54 Flagler: An exciting new development coming soon.

properties.title: 565 Broome Street
properties.content:
565 Broome Street in the heart of New York City's stylish SoHo neighborhood is a fresh landmark co-developed by Lefferts. This remarkable zero-waste high-rise, designed by renowned architect Renzo Piano, exudes exceptional craftsmanship and luxury.

The building itself, Piano's first residential building in New York City, is an architectural masterpiece. Curved glass corners stretch serenely upwards and residents of the impeccably designed apartments, with interiors designed by RDAI, enjoy access to a range of first-class amenities. In addition to a 55-foot indoor swimming pool, fitness center, and spa with sauna and steam rooms, the building also features an interior landscaped lounge, library, and wet bar, providing residents with a range of spaces to relax and unwind.

565 Broome Street is conveniently located in the heart of SoHo, a neighborhood known for its vibrant arts scene, upscale shops, and dining options. Residents can easily walk or take public transportation to enjoy all that the area has to offer.
properties.seoDescription: Discover 565 Broome Street: A stunning zero-waste high-rise in SoHo, NYC, co-developed by Lefferts and designed by Renzo Piano. This architectural masterpiece features curved glass corners and luxurious residences with access to premier amenities including a 55-foot indoor pool, fitness center, spa, landscaped lounge, and more. Ideally situated in the vibrant SoHo neighborhood, residents enjoy proximity to world-class dining, shopping, and cultural experiences.

properties.title: Astoria North
properties.address: 3-15 26th Avenue  Astoria, Queens County, New York
properties.content:
Astoria North, a new development in Astoria Queens, is transforming a once-industrial waterfront district into a vibrant and thriving neighborhood for people of all ages and backgrounds. The development, which is being carefully and collaboratively planned, will feature affordable homes, a waterfront park, open spaces, and retail and community opportunities. Beyond creating a new destination for residents and visitors, it will also help to revitalize the surrounding area and support the growth of the local community.

One of the standout features of Astoria North is the waterfront park, which will provide a beautiful and inviting space for residents to enjoy the outdoors. The park will feature walking and biking trails, playgrounds, and grassy areas for picnics and other activities. It will also offer stunning views of the East River and the surrounding cityscape.

A variety of retail and community opportunities, such as shops, restaurants, and services will also be included. These businesses will provide employment and support the local economy, while also offering convenient amenities for residents.
highlights: 1.3 Million Square Feet Located on 3.7 Acres
properties.seoDescription: Discover Astoria North: A transformative new development in Astoria Queens revitalizing a once-industrial waterfront district into a vibrant, thriving neighborhood. Thoughtfully planned to include affordable homes, retail, community spaces, and a waterfront park with walking and biking trails, playgrounds, and stunning East River views. Astoria North fosters community growth while offering convenient amenities, employment opportunities, and a beautiful outdoor lifestyle for residents and visitors alike.

properties.title: The Leonard
properties.content:
The Leonard, co-developed by Lefferts, is a luxurious residential development located in the heart of Lower Manhattan's chic TriBeCa neighborhood. This elegant 1920s building with a neo-classical brick and limestone façade was meticulously reimagined by SLCE Architects as a 66-unit boutique condominium with contemporary loft-style apartments and a curated collection of amenities.

One- to three-bedroom residences and penthouses feature soaring ceiling heights from 10.5 to 18 feet high. Interiors with gourmet eat-in kitchens and in-unit laundry machines are finished with premium materials and appliances, providing residents with a truly luxurious living experience.

Standout amenities of The Leonard include the common roof deck, which offers breathtaking views of some of New York City's most iconic buildings. Other amenities include a fitness center, a children's playroom, and a central laundry room.
properties.seoDescription: Discover The Leonard: A luxurious residential development co-developed by Lefferts in the heart of Lower Manhattan’s chic TriBeCa neighborhood. This elegant 1920s building with a neo-classical brick and limestone façade was meticulously reimagined by SLCE Architects as a 66-unit boutique condominium featuring contemporary loft-style apartments and a curated collection of amenities. Residences offer soaring ceiling heights, gourmet kitchens, and premium finishes, complemented by standout amenities including a roof deck with breathtaking city views, a fitness center, a children’s playroom, and more.
